name: zBot Replay
summary: Learn about .ZBOT files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: zBot is a Geometry Dash mod that allows players to record and play back their gameplay. Players can also use zBot to slow down Geometry Dash's gameplay, making levels easier to complete (and successful replays easier to record).

After a player finishes creating a replay, they can choose to save it in a ZBOT file. zBot saves ZBOT files in the ~/​Geometry Dash/​replays directory. Any player who has zBot installed can load a ZBOT file to play the replay it contains.

instructions: You can open a ZBOT file in Geometry Dash with the zBOT mod installed (Windows). To do so, first make sure your ZBOT file is saved in the following directory:
Then, open Geometry Dash and press Right Shift to open zBot. After the zBot window appears, select the Open Replays Folder button to open your replays folder and load your ZBOT file.
